==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Originally a {{liushu|p|nocap=y}} of a nose; in China (and East Asia) one points at one’s nose to indicate oneself, hence an {{liushu|i|nocap=y}} of “self”.

The original meaning of “nose” has been lost; compare {{zh-l|白*}} (originally “acorn”, now “white”). The derivative {{zh-l|鼻*}} refers to the original word.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[self]], [[oneself]]; one's own
#: {{zh-x|自顧自|each minding his own business; each for himself}}
# [[certainly]], [[of course]]
# [[personally]]
# [[since]]; [[from]]
#: {{zh-x|自 左 而 右|from left to right}}
